routing_params_file.help: Path to the routing parameters file.

connectivity_file.help: Path to the network connectivity file.

runoff_file.help: Path to the file with runoff values to be routed.

outflow_file.help: Path where the outflows file should be saved.

job_name.help: A name for this job to be printed in debug statements.

log_file.help: Path to a file where the log will be written.

routing_method.help: Method for solving the routing equations: either 'numerical' or 'analytical'.

petsc_ksp_type.help: Name of the solver method to be used by PETSC when the routing method is numerical.

progress_bar.help: Indicates whether or not to show a progress bar in debug statements: true or false.

dt_outflows.help: Time interval in seconds between writing flows to disc.

dt_routing.help: Time interval in seconds between routing computations.

lhs_file.help: Path where the LHS matrix should be cached.

lhsinv_file.help: Path where the LHS inverse matrix should be cached.

adj_file.help: Path where the adjacency matrix should be cached.

qinit_file.help: Path to the initial flows file.

rinit_file.help: Path to the initial runoff file.

qfinal_file.help: Path where the final flows file should be saved.

rfinal_file.help: Path where the final runoff file should be saved.

runoff_volume_var.help: Name of the runoff volume variable in the runoff file.
